Home » About us

David Hobbs

David is one of the founders of the BOHATÉ boat company. He graduated from Boston University in 1997, then he moved to Vancouver in 2001. David is very passionate about work and life. If you any questions about BOHATÉ contact him at david@bohate.ca.

Alex Hunt

Alex had been working in the boat industry for ten years before he became one of the founders of the BOHATÉ boat company. He shares lots of his past and valuable experience to operate BOHATÉ and helped thousands of customer to get the boats they love.
